title.rendered: What is Local SEO? – A Beginner’s Guide [Video]

content.rendered:
A whopping 46% of all Google searches are for local products/services.

Whether your business is based in New York or Atlanta, targeting a local audience should be your top priority.

At Search Berg, we specialize in helping you do just that. Our local SEO services are designed to help you rank higher for local search, get more calls, and grow your business! But what is local SEO? And how can local SEO tips help you target and convert customers?

Here’s a complete guide to local SEO for small businesses:
